info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, southeastern Granite, northwestern Silver Bow and south central Powell Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 728 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anaconda, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Decreased visibility due to rain and small hail. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, West Valley, Warm Springs, Galen, Gregson Hot Springs, Lost Creek, Crackerville, Opportunity, and Racetrack. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 194 and 212. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
